A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi is such a mixed bag. On the one hand\, we have a set of characters in which we have a strong franchise investment in that "Galaxy far\, far away." We have a movie that spent whatever was necessary on its sets and special effects.

On the other hand\, we have so many questions that were glossed aside. We have a weak story that disappoints given the franchise and the legacy characters.

My reaction reminds me of how I felt about The Phantom Menace; a major disappointment given the expectations they had raised. I glad I saw it and will certainly rewatch it when its on the Premium TV channels. I still care about the resistances' outcome and what happens in the future to the characters. I just hope that IX rightens the storyline.
